edu.brown.cs.systems.tracingplane.baggage_layer.protocol

Class HeaderSerialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.brown.cs.systems.tracingplane.baggage_layer.protocol.HeaderSerialization

  • public class HeaderSerialization
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods to serialize and deserialize header atoms (eg, AtomPrefixes.IndexedHeaderPrefix and AtomPrefixes.KeyedHeaderPrefix atoms)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PREFIX_SIZE
      Atom prefixes are 1 byte long

    • Constructor Summary

      private HeaderSerialization()

        Returns:
        the serialized size of the atom for this bagkey

      • writeAtom

        public static void writeAtom(java.nio.ByteBuffer buf,
                             BagKey.Indexed bagKey,
                             int level)
        Write an atom to the provided buffer for the specified bagKey and level. This will write both the atom prefix and its payload
        Parameters:
        buf - the buffer to write to
        bagKey - the bagKey to write
        level - the level of the bagKey

      • serialize

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer serialize(BagKey bagKey,
                                            int level)
        Serialize the header atom, including prefix byte, for the provided bagKey and level
        Parameters:
        bagKey - the key to write a header for
        level - the level of this key
        Returns:
        the header atom representing the provided key and level

        level - the level of this key
        Returns:

      • serializePayload

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer serializePayload(BagKey.Indexed bagKey)
        Serialize the atom payload for the provided bagkey, excluding atom prefix. The returned buffer will have allocated room for a prefix byte, but not filled it. The position of the returned buffer will be the start of the payload.
        Parameters:
        bagKey - the key to write a header for
        Returns:
        a buffer containing the payload of the header atom

      • serializePayload

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer serializePayload(BagKey.Keyed bagKey)
        Serialize the atom payload for the provided bagkey, excluding atom prefix. The returned buffer will have allocated room for a prefix byte, but not filled it. The position of the returned buffer will be the start of the payload.
        Parameters:
        bagKey - the key to write a header for
        Returns:
        a buffer containing the payload of the header atom

      • parse

        public static BagKey parse(java.nio.ByteBuffer atom)
                    throws AtomLayerException,
                           BaggageLayerException
        Parses a bag key from the provided atom
        Parameters:
        atom - a buffer containing both the prefix of the atom and its payload
        Returns:
        a bag key
        Throws:
        AtomLayerException - if the header payload could not be parsed
        BaggageLayerException - if the atom is not a header atom

      • parse

        public static BagKey parse(AtomPrefixes.HeaderPrefix prefix,
                           java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
                    throws BaggageLayerException
        Parses a bag key
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix of the atom
        buf - the payload of the atom
        Returns:
        a bag key
        Throws:
        BaggageLayerException - if the atom is not a header atom or if the header payload could not be parsed

      • parseIndexedHeaderPayload

        public static BagKey parseIndexedHeaderPayload(AtomPrefixes.HeaderPrefix prefix,
                                               java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
                                        throws BaggageLayerException
        Parse the payload of an indexed header
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix of this atom
        buf - the payload of the atom
        Returns:
        the parsed bagkey
        Throws:
        BaggageLayerException - if the atom payload could not be parsed

        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix of this atom
        buf - the payload of the atom
        Returns:
        the parsed bagkey
        Throws:
        BaggageLayerException - if the atom payload could not be parsed
